__NOTOC__

== <span style="color:dimgray;">Twitter user: @</span><span style="font-size: 110%;color:salmon;font-weight:bold;">''$this.twitter:name$''</span> ==

= <span style="color:dimgray;">Statistics </span>=
<div style="color:dimgray;">
<span style="font-weight:bold;">Location: </span> <span style="color:black;">$this.twitter:location$</span>

<span style="font-weight:bold;">Status: </span><span style="color:black;">"''$this.twitter:status$''"</span>

<span style="font-weight:bold;">Number of Friends: </span><span style="color:black;">$this.twitter:friendsCount$</span>

<span style="font-weight:bold;">Number of followers: </span><span style="color:black;">$this.twitter:followersCount$</span>
</div>


= <span style="color:dimgray;">Users following $this.twitter:name$</span> =
<div style="border-style:solid; border-width:8px;border-color:gainsboro;">
{{ #widget : GMap
  | markers = $SELECT ?image ?location  ?link (CONCAT("Location: ", ?location) AS ?description)
    			WHERE { ?Follower <http://twitter.com/follows> ?? . 
    			?Follower <http://twitter.com/location> ?location . 
    			OPTIONAL {?Follower <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/thumbnail> ?image}  
    			?Follower <http://twitter.com/location> ?address . 
                BIND(?Follower AS ?link) }$
  | asynch = true
}}
</div>
</br>
=<span style="color:dimgray;">Followers number growth statistics</span>=
{{ #widget : LineChart
  | input = 'date'
  | output = {{ 'o' }}
  | query = 'SELECT ?p ?o ?date
WHERE {
  GRAPH <http://www.fluidops.com/history/MetaContext> {
    ?provider <http://www.fluidops.com/history/Provider/hasFullSnapshot> ?snapshotId .
    ?snapshotId dc:date ?date .
  }
  GRAPH ?snapshotId {
    ?? twitter:followersCount ?o
  } 
}ORDER BY ASC(?o)'
  | historic = true
  | height = '350'
}}

<br/>

=<span style="color:dimgray;">Friends number growth statistics</span>=

{{ #widget : LineChart
  | input = 'date'
  | output = {{ 'o' }}
  | query = 'SELECT ?p ?o ?date
WHERE {
  GRAPH <http://www.fluidops.com/history/MetaContext> {
    ?provider <http://www.fluidops.com/history/Provider/hasFullSnapshot> ?snapshotId .
    ?snapshotId dc:date ?date .
  }
  GRAPH ?snapshotId {
    ?? twitter:friendsCount ?o
  }
}ORDER BY ASC(?o)'
  | historic = true
  | height = '350'
}}

<br/>
